body:
All Versions

  • Compare Networks: Added custom export feature to allow user to select specific pages for export. Full export is still available and is the default.
  • Recruitment: Added a new Recruitment tile for quickly creating a list of providers in the market but not in the user's networks.
  • Settings: Fixed an issue when loading Specialty Mapping page in a project that does not have a Specialty Mapping set. User will now be prompted to set it.
